description:
A girl who has a crush on Ryo. She was born in Japan but went to elementary school in Vancouver due to her parents` occupation. After returning to Japan, she began living with her grandmother in Yokosuka. When she transferred to a middle school in Yokosuka, she was bullied because she had trouble fitting in. As a result, she was bullied but was saved by Ryo who came in to defend her. Ever since, she has been secretly admiring Ryo. Nozomi has a strong will but is also able to be considerate for others. She usually spends time helping her grandmotherâ€™s flower shop.
Source: Official site
name: Harasaki Nozomi
